table.name: civicrm_task
table.comment: To-do items. Can be assigned to self or other entities.

field.name: description
field.title: Description
field.comment: Optional verbose description of the Task. May be used for display - HTML allowed.

field.name: task_type_id
field.title: Task Type
field.comment: Configurable task type values (e.g. App Submit, App Review...). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: owner_entity_table
field.comment: Name of table where Task owner being referenced is stored (e.g. civicrm_contact or civicrm_group).

field.name: owner_entity_id
field.title: Task Owner ID
field.comment: Foreign key to Task owner (contact, group, etc.).

field.name: parent_entity_table
field.comment: Name of table where optional Task parent is stored (e.g. civicrm_project, or civicrm_task for sub-tasks).

field.name: parent_entity_id
field.title: Task Parent
field.comment: Optional foreign key to Task Parent (project, another task, etc.).

field.name: priority_id
field.title: Priority
field.comment: Configurable priority value (e.g. Critical, High, Medium...). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: task_class
field.title: Task Class
field.comment: Optional key to a process class related to this task (e.g. CRM_Quest_PreApp).

field.name: is_active
field.title: Active?
field.comment: Is this record active? For tasks: can it be assigned, does it appear on open task listings, etc.
